title: Shounen Maid Kuuro-kun: Tenshi no Uta
synopsis: Kuuro-kun is made to take over the debts of his father and forced to pay them off by being sold into servitude as a boy maid.
staff: [['Yatabe, Katsuyoshi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Takayama, Katsuhiko', ['Script']], ['Yoshiten', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Hiiragi, Masaki', ['Original Creator']]]
